document_data.name: Boon of Fortune
document_data.mainbody: '''''Boon of fortune''''' was a [[divine]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] that greatly improved the skill and combat prowess of an individual. It was used by [[cleric]]s of the [[deity]] [[Tymora]].
document_data.Effects:
When cast, the recipient of ''boon of fortune'' found themself significantly more talented with weapons they were previously merely proficient. Additionally they became much more successful in other endeavors they undertook.

This spell could only be cast upon bipedal mammals that normally lived upon the land.
document_data.History: The specifications of this spell were inscribed upon the ''[[Flame of the Spirit]]'' when it assumed its tablet form.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required a [[material component]] of either a four-leaf [[clover]] or small piece of [[amber]]. The latter component reduced the duration of the spell's effects.
